compliant.section: This entire privacy policy seems to be striving to align with GDPR principles.
compliant.legal provisions: Principles of processing personal data, lawfulness of processing, transparency and information, information to be provided where personal data are collected, information to be provided where personal data have not been obtained from the data subject

compliant.section: 請注意，我們只會根據您實際使用的融程產品和服務，為特定目的收集您的部分個人資料。
compliant.legal provisions: Data minimisation - data collected must be limited to what is necessary for the purposes of processing.

compliant.section: 另請注意，收集的個人資料項目因產品和服務的性質而異。
compliant.legal provisions: Data minimisation - data collected must be limited to what is necessary for the purposes of processing.

compliant.section: 此外，在某些國家，為了避免錯誤地收集和使用兒童的個人數據，您可能需要額外提供您的年齡或父母（或監護人）的聯絡方式，以便我們徵得您父母（或監護人）的同意）。
compliant.legal provisions: Lawful basis for processing - consent for children's data.

compliant.section: 當您使用融程產品和服務時，您不必根據我們的要求提供您的個人資料。但是，如果您選擇不向融程提供您的個人數據，我們可能無法提供相應的融程產品和服務或回覆您的詢問。
compliant.legal provisions: Right to withdraw consent - users have the right to withdraw consent at any time.

compliant.section: 個人資料是指任何可以直接或間接識別您身分的數據，例如您的姓名、電子郵件地址和 IP 位址。
compliant.legal provisions: Definition of personal data.

compliant.section: Your personal data account (e.g., email address, name, nickname, and date of birth) may be shared under your social media based on your consent.
compliant.legal provisions: Data subject consent; Conditions for consent

compliant.section: When you log in to your Winmate Download Center membership account (path: Visit Winmate's official website http://www.Winmate.com → find "LOGIN" in the upper right corner of the website → enter your E-mail address and password to register for your Winmate Download Center membership account. Your information can be found under "Winmate Account"), you can provide your additional personal data to edit your Winmate Download Center membership account's personal data (e.g., your ID, password, address, and occupation) and enjoy Winmate products and services related to your Winmate membership account (e.g., the product serial number you used for Winmate Download Center product registration, articles and pictures posted and uploaded on the Winmate forum, which may contain your personal data).
compliant.legal provisions: Data subject consent; Conditions for consent

compliant.section: When you purchase our products (e.g., through the Winmate Store) and paid services.
compliant.legal provisions: Processing is necessary for the performance of a contract

compliant.section: In addition to the aforementioned personal data, we may also collect your product data (e.g., product serial number) when you request certain customer services (e.g., product repair services).
compliant.legal provisions: Processing is necessary for the performance of a contract

compliant.section: When you participate in our events or activities.
compliant.legal provisions: Data subject consent

compliant.section: 評估並改進融程產品和服務。
compliant.legal provisions: Legitimate interests

compliant.section: 取得客戶回饋並分析使用者體驗，以開發和評估新產品和服務。
compliant.legal provisions: 處理資料的理由是基於資料控制者的合法利益。融程有合法的利益來收集客戶回饋，以改進其產品和服務。但是，融程必須在收集資料時向個人提供有關其合法利益的資訊。

compliant.section: 為您購買的融程產品和服務提供送貨服務（例如，提供購買證明或發票）、軟體更新和技術通知。
compliant.legal provisions: 為了履行與資料主體的合約或在與資料主體簽訂合約前應資料主體的要求採取步驟，需要處理資料。融程需要處理個人資料才能履行其合約義務，例如提供產品和服務。

compliant.section: 處理並履行您已註冊的任何訂閱，包括融程eDM 或新聞通訊，讓您隨時了解最新的融程新聞、促銷活動和即將舉辦的活動。您可以隨時免費取消訂閱。
compliant.legal provisions: 資料主體已明確同意將其個人資料用於一個或多個特定目的。融程必須獲得個人明確同意，才能向其發送行銷通訊。

compliant.section: 向您發送重要通知，例如有關我們的條款、條件和政策變更的通訊。由於此類通訊的重要性，您不得選擇不接收這些通訊。
compliant.legal provisions: 為了遵守資料控制者應盡的法律義務，需要處理資料。融程可能有法律義務通知個人有關其條款、條件或政策的變更。

compliant.section: 經您事先同意的任何其他目的。
compliant.legal provisions: Consent of the data subject

compliant.section: 匿名資料是指任何無法直接或間接識別您身分的數據，例如您的產品型號、軟體版本和發票日期。
compliant.legal provisions: ‘personal data’ means any information relating to an identified or identifiable natural person (‘data subject’)

compliant.section:
2. Retention of Your Personal Data
We will retain your personal data for the period necessary to fulfill the purposes outlined in this Privacy Policy unless a longer retention period is required or permitted by law for other necessary purposes. For example, we may retain your personal data for an adequate and reasonable period for customer relationship management purposes; to comply with tax law or other laws and regulations, we may retain your personal data for the period required by such laws and regulations; to comply with requests from government or judicial authorities for purposes such as an investigation or lawsuit, we may retain your personal data for a longer retention period. In addition, if you wish to withdraw your previous consent to our collection of your personal data, we will stop collecting your personal data based on your request and will only retain your personal data collected before the withdrawal.
compliant.legal provisions: Data minimization principle: Personal data shall be kept in a form which permits identification of data subjects for no longer than is necessary for the purposes for which the personal data are processed;

compliant.section:
1 您的同意
只有在您事先同意的情況下，我們才會向其他第三方揭露或分享您的個人資料。
compliant.legal provisions: Data subject consent must be freely given, specific, informed, and unambiguous.  Data subjects have the right to withdraw consent at any time.

compliant.section:
3.3 服務提供者
我們可能會向為我們或代表我們提供服務的服務提供者揭露和分享您的個人資料的必要項目，例如協助我們發送行銷通訊和舉辦行銷活動/活動的行銷機構、提供維修服務的貨運本公司以及向您購買的產品、處理您的帳單的支付服務提供者以及向您提供客戶支援服務（例如，產品維修服務、透過融程 呼叫中心和融程 線上客戶服務入口網站提供的服務）的客戶服務提供者。這些服務提供者只能按照我們的指示和本協議目的範圍使用您的個人資料； 融程 確保我們所有的服務提供者嚴格遵守隱私權政策。
compliant.legal provisions: Data controllers must have a written contract with data processors, outlining the processing activities, purpose, duration, and data security obligations.

compliant.section:
4. 跨境處理您的個人資料
本段介紹融程可能會將您的個人資料轉移到不同國家，但前提是融程應遵守這些國家的隱私權相關法規。
您瞭解並同意，當您同意向融程 提供您的個人資料時，您的個人資料可能會傳輸、儲存、使用或處理給融程 及其任何附屬實體、可能位於不同國家/地區的服務提供商，以便你。所有上述對您個人資料的傳輸、儲存或處理均應遵守隱私權政策以及有關隱私權保護和個人資料安全的適用法律。
compliant.legal provisions: Chapter V Transfers of personal data to third countries or international organisations

compliant.section:
5. Cookie和類似技術
本段介紹融程和第三方如何在融程產品和服務上使用cookie和類似技術，以及您如何管理cookie設定。
融程和我們的第三方合作夥伴使用cookie（cookie 是放置在您的產品上的小文字文件，用於個人化您在融程產品和服務上的使用者體驗）和類似技術（例如網路信標）向您提供我們的產品和服務。當您造訪融程網站網域下的我們網站之一（包括微型網站和特定國家的版本）時，此類融程網站可能會使用以下部分或全部cookie和類似技術。
幾乎所有透過cookie收集的資料只會儲存在您的產品中，而不會傳輸到融程。只有在極少數且有限的情況下，您透過cookie收集的資料可能會共用給融程。
compliant.legal provisions: Principles relating to processing of personal data: Lawfulness, fairness and transparency; Purpose limitation

compliant.section: Cookie 可讓您造訪 Winmate 產品和服務並從一個頁面移至另一個頁面，而無需在後續造訪中再次登入
compliant.legal provisions: Consent is presumed for cookies that are strictly necessary for a service explicitly requested by the user.

compliant.section: 儲存您的偏好和設定 我們使用 cookie 來維護您對產品的設定和偏好，例如您的首選語言、位置或字體；透過將設定儲存在 Cookie 中，您無需在每次造訪我們的產品和服務時重新套用您的偏好和設定
compliant.legal provisions: Consent is presumed for cookies that are strictly necessary for a service explicitly requested by the user.

compliant.section: 此類 cookie 也用於限制您看到廣告的次數，並幫助衡量廣告活動的有效性。 Winmate 透過使用廣告活動服務放置 cookie
compliant.legal provisions: Consent to cookies for targeted advertising must be specific, informed, and freely given. This section implies a form of consent by using the website, which may not meet the GDPR's standard for explicit consent.

compliant.section: 觀看我們網站中嵌入的 YouTube 影片 我們使用 Cookie 來幫助我們將 YouTube 影片插入我們的網站。您可以使用 Google Inc. 提供的此類 Cookie 透過我們的網站觀看 YouTube 影片。
compliant.legal provisions: This section mentions the use of cookies by Google for embedded YouTube videos. It complies with the GDPR by informing users about the third-party (Google) involved in data processing.

compliant.section:
5.2 如何管理cookie設定
請注意，您可以透過造訪您安裝的瀏覽器來設定Cookie設置，以接受、封鎖或刪除部分或全部Cookie（例如第三方Cookie）。
compliant.legal provisions: This section aligns with the GDPR by explaining how users can manage their cookie settings, including accepting, blocking, or deleting cookies. It empowers users to exercise their right to withdraw consent.

compliant.section:
如何透過 Google Chrome 瀏覽器控制您的Cookie設定：
https://support.google.com/chrome/answer/95647?hl=zh-CN
如何透過 Microsoft Internet Explorer 瀏覽器控制您的Cookie設定：
https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/help/278835/how-to-delete-cookie-files-in-internet-explorer
如何透過 Mozilla Firefox 瀏覽器控制您的Cookie設定：
https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/kb/delete-cookies-remove-info-websites-stored
如何透過 Apple Safari 瀏覽器控制您的Cookie設定：
https://support.apple.com/guide/safari/manage-cookies-and-website-data-sfri11471/mac
compliant.legal provisions: Providing users with clear and concise information on how to control their cookie settings aligns with the GDPR's principles of transparency and user control (Articles 12 and 13).

compliant.section:
3 網路信標
網路信標是一種通常透明的1x1（像素）GIF或PNG圖像，在網站或電子郵件中實施，用於衡量行銷活動的有效性。融程或我們的服務提供者可能會使用網路信標來了解您是否造訪了某些頁面或點擊了融程產品和服務中的連結。我們可能會在我們的行銷通訊（例如eDM或融程電子報）中實施網路信標，以了解您點擊或閱讀了哪些通訊內容。我們將使用網路信標中的資料來改善我們的網站以及融程產品和服務。
compliant.legal provisions: Data subjects must be informed about the existence of automated decision-making, including profiling, and provided with meaningful information about the logic involved, as well as the significance and envisaged consequences of such processing.

compliant.section: 融程及其附屬實體不同地點之間的個人資料傳輸是透過我們安全的廣域網路進行的。當您向我們提交個人資料時，您的個人資料在線上和線下都會受到保護。
compliant.legal provisions: Data must be processed in a manner that ensures appropriate security of the personal data, including protection against unauthorised or unlawful processing and against accidental loss, destruction or damage, using appropriate technical or organisational measures ('integrity and confidentiality').

compliant.section: 當您發現您的融程會員帳戶的帳戶名稱/密碼被盜用時，請立即與我們聯絡。 融程可以暫停或終止使用該帳號名稱/密碼（或其任何部分）登入您的 融程會員帳號的權限，並刪除與您的 融程會員帳號相關的個人資料。
compliant.legal provisions: Personal data must be kept in a form which permits identification of data subjects for no longer than is necessary for the purposes for which the personal data are processed ('storage limitation');  right to erasure ('right to be forgotten')

compliant.section: 您可以透過登入您的融程會員帳戶並編輯您的帳戶資料來檢視和變更您的帳戶資料。
compliant.article numbers: 15: Right of access, 12: Transparent information, communication and modalities for the exercise of the rights of the data subject
compliant.legal provisions: This aligns with GDPR's requirement for data access and transparency, allowing users to view and modify their data.

compliant.section: 您可以透過您安裝的瀏覽器管理Cookie設定，以接受、封鎖或刪除部分或全部Cookie（例如第三方Cookie）或隨時採用其他設定。
compliant.legal provisions: This aligns with GDPR's requirement for consent regarding cookies. Users have the right to accept, block, or delete cookies.

compliant.section: 如果您不希望融程透過第三方Cookie向您提供個人化行銷服務和廣告，您可以隨時透過瀏覽器封鎖或刪除第三方Cookie。
compliant.legal provisions: This aligns with GDPR's requirement for consent regarding cookies, specifically for direct marketing purposes.

compliant.section:
8.4 聯絡融程管理您的個人資料
如果您對您的融程會員帳戶下的個人資料有任何要求和疑問，您可以透過融程官網「客戶對個人資料的請求」介面或發送電子郵件至https://www.winmate.com/Inquiry，與我們聯繫或融程收集的其他個人數據，例如請求訪問、更正、下載、阻止、刪除、反對融程 使用您的部分或全部個人數據（例如，如果您認為融程 可能會錯誤地收集和使用您的個人數據，您可以聯絡我們）您的個人資料）並始終限制融程 在某些特定情況下使用您的個人資料（例如，如果您不希望分析您的個人數據，您可以聯絡我們）。
compliant.legal provisions: Right of access, Right to rectification, Right to erasure ('right to be forgotten'), Right to restriction of processing, Right to object

compliant.section: 此外，如果您同意融程透過融程產品和服務收集您的個人數據，您可以透過更改隱私權相關設定（特別是 融程 產品和服務）來撤回您的同意（請參閱本隱私權政策中的 8.2）或向我們提交您撤回同意的請求。我們將停止收集您的個人數據，並且僅保留在提出撤回請求之前收集的您的個人資料。
compliant.legal provisions: Right to withdraw consent

compliant.section: 未經父母同意，我們不會故意收集十六 (16) 歲或相關司法管轄區同等最低年齡以下兒童的個人資料。我們鼓勵家長（或監護人）在使用 融程 產品和服務時積極參與孩子的線上活動和興趣。
compliant.legal provisions: This section aligns with Article 8 of the GDPR, which outlines the conditions for the lawful processing of children's personal data. Specifically, it establishes the age of consent for information society services (ISS) as 16 years old, but allows member states to lower the age to a minimum of 13 years old.  This section acknowledges the need for parental consent for data processing of children below the age of 16 (or the equivalent minimum age in the relevant jurisdiction) and encourages parental involvement in their children's online activities.

compliant.section: 如果您是兒童，請在使用 融程 產品和服務之前徵求家長同意。您只能在父母（或監護人）同意的情況下向我們提交您的個人資料。
compliant.legal provisions: This section aligns with Article 8 of the GDPR by explicitly stating that children must obtain parental consent before using Winmate's products and services or submitting personal data. This reinforces the importance of parental consent for processing children's data.

compliant.section: 您的父母（或監護人）可以透過融程官網「客戶索取個人資料」介面或發送電子郵件至https://www.winmate.com/Inquiry，與我們聯絡撤銷或撤回先前給予的任何同意
compliant.legal provisions: This section aligns with Article 8(2) of the GDPR, which grants parents the right to withdraw consent to the processing of their child's personal data at any time. The policy clearly states that parents can contact Winmate to revoke any previously given consent.

compliant.section:
10. 敏感個人資料
融程 絕不會要求您提供敏感的個人數據，例如有關您的醫療或健康記錄、政治、宗教或哲學信仰、刑事犯罪（指控或實施）、刑事定罪背景、種族或民族、工會的數據會員資格、性取向、性史、行為或遺傳資料。請不要向我們提供此類敏感的個人資料。
compliant.legal provisions: Processing of special categories of personal data

compliant.section: 我們使用cookie來增強我們網站上提供的服務和功能、改善您的使用者體驗並衡量我們行銷工作的有效性。點擊「同意」即表示您同意我們使用Cookie和我們的隱私權政策。您也可以點擊「僅接受必要」以僅允許必要的Cookie，例如用於安全登入、調整您的同意偏好以及YouTube Cookie整合的Cookie。
compliant.legal provisions: 要求明確、自由、具體且知情的同意。使用者必須能夠輕易撤回同意。

compliant.section: 如果您不接受任何cookie，請點擊「不同意」，但請注意，這可能會影響您的瀏覽體驗。
compliant.legal provisions: 拒絕同意不得妨礙使用者使用服務。

non_compliant.section: The policy mentions children's data but lacks specifics on parental consent mechanisms for children under 16 as required by GDPR.
non_compliant.legal provisions: Conditions applicable to child's consent in relation to information society services
non_compliant.amend: Specify how parental consent is obtained for children under 16, including how consent is verified and how children can exercise their rights.

non_compliant.section: While the policy broadly mentions data collection, it needs to explicitly state the legal basis for each processing activity (e.g., consent, contract, legitimate interest).
non_compliant.legal provisions: Lawfulness of processing
non_compliant.amend: For each data processing purpose, clearly identify and document the specific legal basis (consent, contract, legal obligation, etc.) that justifies it.

non_compliant.section: The policy lacks details about data retention periods. GDPR mandates data should be kept only as long as necessary.
non_compliant.legal provisions: Principles relating to processing of personal data (specifically storage limitation)
non_compliant.amend: Define and disclose the specific criteria used to determine data retention periods for different categories of personal data.

non_compliant.section: The policy doesn't explicitly mention data subject rights (access, rectification, erasure, etc.) which are crucial under GDPR.
non_compliant.legal provisions: Chapter III - Rights of the data subject
non_compliant.amend: Clearly outline data subjects' rights, including access, rectification, erasure, restriction of processing, data portability, and objection, and explain how individuals can exercise these rights.

non_compliant.section: The policy doesn't mention the international data transfer mechanism if data is transferred outside the EEA, which is essential for GDPR compliance.
non_compliant.legal provisions: Chapter V - Transfers of personal data to third countries or international organisations
non_compliant.amend: If data is transferred outside the EEA, specify the legal mechanism used (e.g., adequacy decision, standard contractual clauses, binding corporate rules) to ensure adequate protection.

non_compliant.section:
融程可能會在您事先同意的情況下收集您的以下個人資料：
您在註冊融程會員帳戶時真實、準確、最新且完整的註冊數據，包括您的電子郵件地址、國家/地區和年齡（目前僅在某些國家/地區要求）。
non_compliant.legal provisions: Lawfulness of processing, unambiguous consent - consent must be freely given, specific, informed and unambiguous. Listing all data collected without clear purpose tied to each data point is not specific enough.
non_compliant.amend: Specify the exact purpose for collecting each piece of data (email, country, age) and how it's necessary for the service.  Provide separate and granular consent options for each purpose.

non_compliant.section: 如果您使用您的社群媒體帳戶（例如，您的Facebook 或Google 帳戶）註冊融程 會員帳戶，則此類社群媒體提供者（例如，Facebook Inc. 或Google Inc.
non_compliant.legal provisions: Purpose limitation - data can only be collected for specified, explicit and legitimate purposes.
non_compliant.amend: Clearly state the purpose of collecting data from social media accounts and how it relates to the service provided. Obtain separate consent for accessing and processing this data.

non_compliant.section: Your name, contact information, email, gender, date of birth, product data (e.g., product data)
non_compliant.legal provisions: Data minimisation
non_compliant.amend: Specify the specific and limited purposes for collecting each data category (name, contact information, email, gender, date of birth, product data) and ensure that the collection is limited to what is necessary for those purposes.

non_compliant.section: Your invoice copy (in some countries, your name, address, and other personal data may be included in your invoice).
non_compliant.legal provisions: Data minimisation
non_compliant.amend: Limit the personal data collected through invoices to what is strictly necessary for billing purposes. If additional information is needed for other purposes (e.g., marketing), obtain separate consent.

non_compliant.section: The actual items of your personal data collected will vary depending on the corresponding event or activity.
non_compliant.legal provisions: Transparency and information to be provided; Purposes of the processing; recipients of the personal data
non_compliant.amend: Provide specific and granular information about the categories of personal data collected for each event or activity. Clearly identify the recipients or categories of recipients of the data.

non_compliant.section: 此外，如果您是我們活動或活動的獲獎者，或者您將收到融程 的贈品，您可能需要額外提供您的郵寄/送貨地址（包括郵遞區號）和個人資料以進行納稅申報（例如，您的居住地址）地址、身分證或護照號碼及其副本）。
non_compliant.legal provisions: Data minimization, purpose limitation
non_compliant.amend: The company should only collect the minimum amount of data necessary for tax reporting and prize delivery.  Collecting ID/passport copies is excessive and likely unlawful.  The company should clarify the specific data collected for tax purposes and ensure it's proportionate.

non_compliant.section: 當您使用融程產品時，我們可能會收集您的產品數據，例如您的產品序號、IP 位址、MAC 位址、Android ID 號碼和其他唯一產品識別碼。
non_compliant.legal provisions: Data minimization, purpose limitation
non_compliant.amend: Collecting data like IP addresses, MAC addresses, and Android ID numbers might be considered personal data. The company needs to justify the collection of this data and how it's necessary for the specific purpose. They should explore less intrusive alternatives if possible.

non_compliant.section: 您與融程 產品和服務相關的位置數據，例如您的GPS 訊號、識別附近Wi-Fi 存取點和手機訊號塔的數據、您所在國家/地區、城市、時區、緯度、經度、海拔高度以及座標精度。
non_compliant.legal provisions: Explicit consent for location data, Lawfulness of processing
non_compliant.amend: Collecting precise geolocation data like GPS signals requires explicit consent from the user. The company needs to provide users with a clear and separate option to consent to this data collection. They should also explain how long this data is stored and for what purpose.

non_compliant.section: 您聯絡融程時的語音、視訊、通訊記錄（例如，透過撥打融程呼叫中心、使用融程線上客戶服務入口網站與融程聊天、在融程官網填寫線上申請表以及發送電子郵件）到融程）。此外，當您造訪融程RMA 服務中心和融程辦公室時，我們可能會透過安全攝影機記錄您的影像。此外，當您使用我們的機器人相關產品和服務時，我們可能會收集您的語音指令以及可能包含您家庭環境影像的視訊記錄。上述語音、視訊和通訊記錄可能包含您的個人資料。
non_compliant.legal provisions: Purpose limitation, Data minimization, Explicit consent for sensitive data
non_compliant.amend: Collecting and processing sensitive data like voice recordings, video recordings (especially those capturing home environments), requires explicit consent. The company needs to clearly specify the purpose of collecting this data and obtain explicit consent from users. They should explore alternatives to collecting this data or ensure appropriate safeguards are in place to protect it.

non_compliant.section: 完成融程會員帳號的註冊流程並體驗與融程會員帳號相關的融程產品和服務（例如融程論壇的產品註冊和服務）。
non_compliant.legal provisions: 以與收集資料的目的不相容的方式進一步處理個人資料……
non_compliant.amend: 融程需要指定處理個人資料的特定目的，並且只能將其用於這些目的。融程不應將個人資料用於與其收集目的不相容的任何其他目的。

non_compliant.section: 為了驗證您的身分、提供活動或活動參賽作品和獎勵、就活動或活動相關事宜與您聯繫、提供現金返還津貼、報稅並提供班車服務，並在您進入我們的網站時為您投保（如果有必要）活動或競賽。
non_compliant.legal provisions: 以與收集資料的目的不相容的方式進一步處理個人資料……
non_compliant.amend: 融程需要指定處理個人資料的特定目的，並且只能將其用於這些目的。融程不應將個人資料用於與其收集目的不相容的任何其他目的。

non_compliant.section: 為您提供客戶支援服務（例如，滿足您的產品維修請求並回答您的問題）、我們的客戶關懷和客戶滿意度調查以進行使用者體驗分析，並保護您的權益並採取存取控制，當您聯絡融程或造訪融程 RMA中心或維修服務和融程辦事處時，我們可能會收集您的語音、視訊和通訊記錄。此外，我們可能會收集您的語音和視訊記錄，以根據您的要求協助融程機器人相關產品和服務到達特定目的地。
non_compliant.legal provisions: 以與收集資料的目的不相容的方式進一步處理個人資料……處理的法律依據……
non_compliant.amend: 收集語音、視訊和通訊記錄以提供客戶支援和進行使用者體驗分析可能與 GDPR 不符，具體取決於收集資料的上下文和方式。融程需要確定一個合法的處理依據，例如明確同意或合法利益，並確保資料的收集與該依據相稱且必要。

non_compliant.section: 為您提供個人化行銷服務，例如，使用第三方廣告 Cookie 提供我們認為您可能感興趣的行銷傳播和廣告，或根據您對融程的使用推薦您可能感興趣的服務產品和服務。
non_compliant.legal provisions: Conditions for consent, Legitimate Interests
non_compliant.amend: This section should clearly state the legal basis for processing personal data for personalized marketing. If relying on consent, it needs to meet the GDPR's requirements for valid consent (freely given, specific, informed, and unambiguous indication of the data subject's wishes). If relying on legitimate interests, it needs to articulate the specific legitimate interests pursued and demonstrate that these interests are not overridden by the interests or fundamental rights and freedoms of the data subject.

non_compliant.section: 當你使用融程產品和服務時，我們可能會向您收集以下匿名數據，並將這些收集到的匿名數據用於任何目的。此外，當以下匿名數據與您上面列出的個人數據相關聯時，在這種情況下，我們也會將此類匿名數據視為個人數據，並按照與個人數據保護相同的級別來保護此類匿名資料。
non_compliant.legal provisions: Purpose Limitation, Storage Limitation
non_compliant.amend: While it's positive that data initially anonymized but later re-identified is treated as personal data, the policy should specify that data is collected and processed for specified, explicit, and legitimate purposes and not further processed in a manner incompatible with those purposes. It should also mention data retention policies and specify for how long anonymized data is kept.

non_compliant.section: 您與融程產品和服務相關的日誌數據，例如您的產品型號名稱、產品名稱、品牌名稱、製造商名稱、零件號碼、硬體類型和版本（例如 CPU 和主機板）以及作業系統、工廠-預設設定、啟動時間、韌體更新資料（例如，韌體更新的執行方法、更新日期和更新結果）、記憶體和儲存大小、唯讀記憶體(ROM) 相關資料（例如，類型、版本、建立指紋和ROM 構建描述）、攝影機解析度、產品顏色、用於連接我們的產品和服務的電信和網路、網路狀態、電話日誌資料、待機狀態、崩潰歷史記錄、首選介面、瀏覽器的類型、版本和語言設定、診斷和使用資料、您的使用行為、GPS和Wi-Fi版本、系統狀態（例如電池、CPU和RAM的使用狀態）以及本地時間。
non_compliant.legal provisions: Data Minimisation, Information to be provided
non_compliant.amend: The policy should specify the legal basis for collecting each category of data and ensure that the data collected is limited to what is necessary and proportionate for the specified purposes. It should also clearly inform users about the specific types of data collected and the purposes of processing.

non_compliant.section:
3. Who Rongcheng Discloses Your Personal Data to
This section describes to whom Rongcheng may share your personal data with third parties in limited situations and purposes.
Your personal data will not be disclosed to any third party unless one of the following situations exists:
non_compliant.legal provisions: Right to be informed of recipients: The controller shall provide the data subject with information about ... the recipients or categories of recipient to whom the personal data have been or will be disclosed.
non_compliant.amend: The policy should clearly identify the categories of recipients with whom personal data may be shared, such as service providers, business partners, or public authorities. Vague terms like "third parties" are insufficient.

non_compliant.section:
3.2 業務夥伴
我們可能會向我們的業務合作夥伴揭露雜湊和匿名數據，例如，透過第三方廣告 Cookie 基於雜湊和匿名資料提供資料分析服務或廣告和行銷傳播的業務合作夥伴。
non_compliant.legal provisions: While the policy mentions "hashed and anonymized data," it's unclear if this data is truly anonymized under GDPR. GDPR has a high bar for anonymization, requiring that data be irreversibly unidentifiable.
non_compliant.amend: Clarify what measures are taken to ensure data shared with business partners is genuinely anonymized under GDPR.  If data is pseudonymous and not anonymized, specify the legal basis for sharing (e.g., legitimate interest with appropriate safeguards).

non_compliant.section:
3.4 出於法律、保護、安全目的
出於以下法律或安全目的之一，我們可能會向第三方揭露或分享您的個人資料的必要項目：
在適用法律或法規或主管政府或司法機構要求的範圍內，為確立或維持合法索賠或辯護所必需，或者為防止欺詐或其他非法活動所必需。
依據法律要求或允許，保護 融程、我們的服務提供者、客戶或公眾的權利、財產或安全。
non_compliant.legal provisions: While these are legitimate grounds for processing, the policy needs to be more specific. It should clearly state the specific legal obligations or legitimate interests that justify the disclosure.
non_compliant.amend: Provide specific examples of legal obligations (e.g., tax laws) and legitimate interests (e.g., fraud prevention) that may necessitate data disclosure.  Explain how the disclosure is necessary and proportionate to the purpose.

non_compliant.section:
4. 跨境處理您的個人資料
本段介紹融程可能會將您的個人資料轉移到不同國家，但前提是融程應遵守這些國家的隱私權相關法規。
您瞭解並同意，當您同意向融程 提供您的個人資料時，您的個人資料可能會傳輸、儲存、使用或處理給融程 及其任何附屬實體、可能位於不同國家/地區的服務提供商，以便你。所有上述對您個人資料的傳輸、儲存或處理均應遵守隱私權政策以及有關隱私權保護和個人資料安全的適用法律。
non_compliant.legal provisions: Chapter V Transfers of personal data to third countries or international organisations
non_compliant.amend: This section states that data transfers will comply with local privacy laws of those countries. However, GDPR requires that data transfers outside of the EEA must meet specific conditions as outlined in Chapter V, such as adequacy decisions, appropriate safeguards, or derogations. The policy should be amended to explicitly state these conditions and how the company ensures compliance.

non_compliant.section:
5. Cookie和類似技術
本段介紹融程和第三方如何在融程產品和服務上使用cookie和類似技術，以及您如何管理cookie設定。
融程和我們的第三方合作夥伴使用cookie（cookie 是放置在您的產品上的小文字文件，用於個人化您在融程產品和服務上的使用者體驗）和類似技術（例如網路信標）向您提供我們的產品和服務。當您造訪融程網站網域下的我們網站之一（包括微型網站和特定國家的版本）時，此類融程網站可能會使用以下部分或全部cookie和類似技術。
幾乎所有透過cookie收集的資料只會儲存在您的產品中，而不會傳輸到融程。只有在極少數且有限的情況下，您透過cookie收集的資料可能會共用給融程。
non_compliant.legal provisions: Conditions for consent
non_compliant.amend: While the policy mentions the use of cookies and similar technologies, it lacks details on how user consent is obtained. GDPR requires specific and unambiguous consent for non-essential cookies. The policy should clearly explain how consent is obtained, what types of cookies are used, their purpose, and how users can manage their cookie preferences.

non_compliant.section: 使用者輸入功能 我們使用cookie暫時儲存您在Winmate產品和服務上插入的數據，例如Winmate提供的計數cookie。例如，當您透過Winmate產品線享受存取Winmate產品體驗時，此類cookie將幫助您記住產品、您點擊的數量以及您插入的資料。
non_compliant.legal provisions: Explicit and informed consent is required for cookies that are not strictly necessary. This includes cookies used to track user input and behavior.
non_compliant.amend: Clarify that these cookies are not strictly necessary and obtain explicit consent before setting them. Provide users with a clear and concise way to opt out of these cookies.

non_compliant.section:
出於分析目的並向您提供個人化廣告服務和其他功能，我們使用以下Cookie來優化您使用融程產品和服務的體驗：
函數 範例
分析 我們使用 cookie 來統計您造訪 Winmate 產品和服務的次數和長度，以及您造訪最多的部分或功能。這些數據幫助我們分析 Winmate 產品和服務的效能和運作情況，以提高效能並開發新的功能、功能和服務
定位和廣告 我們使用 cookie 收集有關您使用 Winmate 產品和服務的數據，並識別您的興趣，例如您看過的廣告。
non_compliant.legal provisions: Explicit and informed consent is required for cookies that are not strictly necessary. This includes cookies used for analytics, advertising, and personalization.
non_compliant.amend: Provide users with granular control over cookie settings. Allow users to accept or reject different categories of cookies, such as analytics cookies and advertising cookies. Obtain explicit consent for each category of non-essential cookies.

non_compliant.section: 在某些國家/地區，當您第一次瀏覽融程網站時，我們可能會在此類融程網站頂部的橫幅中簡要介紹我們如何使用cookie。您可以透過該橫幅自由選擇接受或封鎖上述第三方cookie。
non_compliant.legal provisions: The GDPR requires consent to be freely given, specific, informed, and unambiguous. Using a cookie banner to gain consent is acceptable, but the language used here is vague. It doesn't specify what "accepting" entails and doesn't meet the standard of unambiguous consent.
non_compliant.amend: Clearly state what data is processed and for what purpose when the user accepts cookies. Provide a way for users to granularly select which cookie categories they consent to. Ensure the cookie banner requires a clear action to consent (e.g., clicking "Accept") and doesn't pre-select any options other than strictly necessary cookies.

non_compliant.section: 如果您選擇封鎖Cookie，您可能無法使用融程產品和服務的所有功能。
non_compliant.legal provisions: The GDPR states that consent should not be a precondition to service when the processing of data is not necessary for the performance of a contract. Denying full functionality for users who decline cookies, when those cookies are not essential, could be considered a form of coercion and violate the GDPR's conditions for valid consent.
non_compliant.amend: Ensure that users who decline non-essential cookies still have access to the core functionality of the website and services. If certain features require cookies, explain this clearly to the user and offer alternative ways to access those features without relying on non-essential cookies.

non_compliant.section:
3 網路信標
網路信標是一種通常透明的1x1（像素）GIF或PNG圖像，在網站或電子郵件中實施，用於衡量行銷活動的有效性。融程或我們的服務提供者可能會使用網路信標來了解您是否造訪了某些頁面或點擊了融程產品和服務中的連結。我們可能會在我們的行銷通訊（例如eDM或融程電子報）中實施網路信標，以了解您點擊或閱讀了哪些通訊內容。我們將使用網路信標中的資料來改善我們的網站以及融程產品和服務。
non_compliant.legal provisions: Data controllers must have a legal basis for processing personal data. Consent must be freely given, specific, informed and unambiguous. It must be as easy to withdraw consent as it is to give it.
non_compliant.amend: This section should clearly state the legal basis for processing this data, such as consent or legitimate interests. If relying on consent, the policy should explain how consent is obtained and that it can be withdrawn at any time. It should also provide clear and separate information about cookie use, ideally through a cookie banner.

non_compliant.section:
7. 安全性
本段介紹融程如何保護您的個人數據，並就您端如何保護您的個人資料提供一些建議。
我們採取預防措施來保護您的個人資料免於未經授權的存取、變更、揭露或破壞。我們對我們的資料收集、儲存和處理實踐以及技術和組織安全措施以及實體安全措施進行內部審查，以防止未經授權存取我們儲存您個人資料的系統。
non_compliant.legal provisions: The GDPR requires controllers and processors to implement appropriate technical and organisational measures to ensure a level of security appropriate to the risk, including pseudonymisation and encryption of personal data, ensuring confidentiality, integrity, availability and resilience of systems, restoring data in a timely manner, and regularly testing, assessing and improving the effectiveness of technical and organisational measures.
non_compliant.amend: While this section mentions taking preventative measures, it lacks specifics about the technical and organizational security measures in place. It should elaborate on data encryption, access controls, employee training, data breach protocols, and regular security assessments.

non_compliant.section: 此外，您也可以透過融程官網「客戶對個人資料的請求」介面或發送電子郵件至https://www.winmate.com/Inquiry
non_compliant.article numbers: 12: Transparent information, communication and modalities for the exercise of the rights of the data subject
non_compliant.legal provisions: GDPR requires providing a specific, valid email address for data subject requests, not just a general inquiry link.
non_compliant.amend: Provide a dedicated and clearly labeled email address specifically for data subject requests (DSR).

non_compliant.section: 請在您的融程會員帳戶下向融程提供您真實、準確、最新、完整的個人數據，以便融程為您提供相應的融程產品和服務。
non_compliant.article numbers: 5(1)(a,b): Principles relating to processing of personal data (lawfulness, fairness and transparency, purpose limitation)
non_compliant.legal provisions: While requesting accurate data is reasonable, GDPR emphasizes purpose limitation. The policy should clarify the specific, legitimate purposes for collecting and processing this data.
non_compliant.amend: Specify the exact purposes for collecting each piece of personal data and how it's used to provide products and services.

non_compliant.section: 如果您想訂閱或取消訂閱融程eDM，並了解融程新聞、最新產品和服務，您可以透過登入您的融程會員帳戶來更改設置，在左欄中找到「訂閱」，選擇「是」或「否」。
non_compliant.legal provisions: Bundling consent for marketing with other services like account access is not compliant. Consent should be freely given, specific, informed, and unambiguous.
non_compliant.amend: Separate consent for marketing communications from other actions like account management. Provide a clear and separate option to opt-in or out of marketing.

non_compliant.section: 如果您選擇「否」取消訂閱，請注意，取消訂閱流程可能需要大約2個工作天才能完成。
non_compliant.legal provisions: While a reasonable processing time is acceptable, GDPR emphasizes efficient responses to withdrawal of consent. Two business days might be considered excessive.
non_compliant.amend: Aim to make unsubscribing effective within a shorter timeframe, ideally immediately or within 24 hours, and clearly inform users about the processing time.

non_compliant.section: 當您使用此類融程產品和服務時，您可以隨時透過特定於 融程 產品和服務的隱私權相關設置，自由選擇啟用或停用與 融程 共用您的個人資料。
non_compliant.legal provisions: The policy should clearly explain what data sharing entails, with whom it's shared, and for what purpose. Vaguely mentioning "data sharing" without specifics is insufficient.
non_compliant.amend: Provide specific details about data sharing practices, including the categories of recipients, the types of data shared, and the purpose of sharing.

non_compliant.section:
8.5 個人資料的準確性
每當您使用融程產品和服務時，我們都會努力維護您個人資料的準確性，並保護您的個人資料免遭任何意外或惡意破壞。我們將滿足您有關您個人資料的要求；但是，在以下情況之一的情況下，我們可能無法滿足您上述的要求：
根據適用法律的要求或允許；
出於合法商業目的；
不合理的重複請求，需要不成比例的技術努力和資源，例如開發新系統或從根本上改變當前的做法；
對他人隱私有潛在風險；
non_compliant.legal provisions: Right of access, Right to rectification, Right to erasure ('right to be forgotten'), Right to restriction of processing
non_compliant.amend: This section lists broad exceptions to data subject rights.  It should specify the lawful basis for each exception and how it applies in this context. For example, instead of "legitimate business purposes," it should state the specific legitimate interest being pursued and explain how it overrides the individual's rights.  It should also clarify what constitutes "unreasonable" requests and provide examples.

non_compliant.section: 本段介紹，為了保護兒童的隱私，如果您是兒童，請在向融程提供您的個人資料之前徵求您的父母（或監護人）的同意。另外，如果您的父母（或監護人）希望管理您的個人數據，可以透過融程官網「客戶個人資料請求」介面聯絡我們，或發送電子郵件至https://www.winmate.com/Inquiry
non_compliant.legal provisions: While this section emphasizes the importance of parental consent, it does not fully comply with Article 12 of the GDPR, which requires data controllers to provide information about the processing of personal data to children in a concise, transparent, intelligible, and easily accessible form, using clear and plain language. The language used in this section might be too complex for children to fully understand.
non_compliant.amend: Amend this section to use child-friendly language that is easy for them to understand. For example, instead of saying "...可以透過融程官網「客戶個人資料請求」介面聯絡我們...", use simpler terms like "...can contact us through the "My Data" section on our website...". Additionally, provide specific examples of what "managing your personal data" entails in a way that children can comprehend.

non_compliant.section: 您的父母（或監護人）可以透過融程官網「客戶索取個人資料」介面或發送電子郵件至https://www.winmate.com/Inquiry，與我們聯絡撤銷或撤回先前給予的任何同意，要求存取、更正、下載、封鎖、刪除、反對 融程 使用您的部分或全部個人資料（例如，您的父母（或監護人）可以聯絡我們，如果他/她認為融程可能錯誤地收集和使用您的個人資料）並在某些特定情況下限制融程使用您的個人資料（例如，您的父母（或監護人）如果不希望您的個人資料洩露，可以聯絡我們）隨時進行分析。
non_compliant.legal provisions: This section, while addressing data subject rights, is not fully compliant with Article 12 of the GDPR due to its complex and lengthy structure. The language and presentation are not clear and concise enough for children or their parents to easily understand their rights and how to exercise them.
non_compliant.amend: Restructure this section to be more concise and use plain language. Break down the different data subject rights (access, rectification, erasure, etc.) into separate bullet points for better readability. Provide specific examples for each right in a way that is easy for children and parents to understand. For instance, instead of saying "...反對 融程 使用您的部分或全部個人資料...", rephrase it as "...say no to us using some or all of your information...".

non_compliant.section:
11. 融程 隱私權政策的變更
我們可能會不時更改隱私權政策，我們強烈建議您定期查看我們網站上發布的隱私權政策。在隱私權政策更新後造訪或使用我們的產品和服務，融程 將視為您同意隱私權政策，包括任何更新。隱私權政策的最新版本將始終在此頁面上提供；有關任何重大變更的重要通知（例如電子郵件通知）將發送給您。您可以隨時查看底部的“更新時間”，以了解最新版本的隱私權政策。
non_compliant.legal provisions: Conditions for consent
non_compliant.amend: GDPR requires explicit and informed consent for any data processing.  It is not enough to assume consent based on continued use of a website or service after a policy update. The policy should clearly state how consent is obtained and provide an easy way for users to withdraw consent.

non_compliant.section:
12。聯絡我們
如果您對隱私權政策有任何疑問、疑問、意見或投訴，或您認為 融程 未遵守隱私權政策，請隨時與我們聯絡。如果您認為我們可能無法妥善處理與 融程 收集的您的個人資料相關的任何問題，請注意，您有權向您所在國家/地區處理個人資料保護的政府機構提出投訴。
要行使您的權利，或者如果您對我們的隱私權政策、資料收集和資訊安全有任何疑問或疑慮，請透過電子郵件與我們聯絡：newsletter@Winmate.
non_compliant.legal provisions: Data subject rights, Data Protection Officer
non_compliant.amend: While mentioning the right to lodge a complaint with a supervisory authority, the policy lacks details about data subject rights (access, rectification, erasure, etc.) and how to exercise them. It should also mention if a Data Protection Officer (DPO) is designated and how to contact them, if applicable.

non_compliant.section: 隱私權政策
non_compliant.legal provisions: 隱私權政策應以簡潔、透明、易於理解和易於取得的方式提供。它應該包含有關資料控制器的資訊、處理目的、資料主體的權利以及其他必要資訊。
non_compliant.amend: 提供更詳細的隱私權政策，說明資料收集和處理的特定目的、資料保留期限、資料傳輸、資料主體的權利以及如何行使這些權利。

non_compliant.section: Copyright © 1996-2024 Winmate Inc. All Rights Reserved.
non_compliant.legal provisions: 雖然版權聲明本身與 GDPR 無關，但重要的是要確保網站上的所有內容（包括翻譯）都符合 GDPR 並且是最新的。
non_compliant.amend: 審查網站內容，確保其符合 GDPR 的最新要求。
